Text:
Note: Requires that AppSync is installed on your iDevice. 
You can install AppSync via Cydia, from the cydia.hackulo.us repository. These games require that you have iOS 3.0 or later.

How to install:
1. Extract game from archive
2. Open IPA in iTunes
3. Sync to your iPhone/iPod
4. Play!

Game List:
-Bejeweled 2
-Bookworm
-Candy Train
-Chuzzle
-Escape Rosecliff island
-Peggle
-Plants vs Zombies
-UNpleasant Horse
great collection. highly recommend. 10/10. ty uploader
